sources.title: Raven (1996) $50M Government Secrets Blow Up | Action Movie starring Burt Reynolds - 4K
sources.description:
For years the government paid him to kill. Now he is self-employed!
A notorious criminal is hunted down by the elite Raven Special Forces team when things go wrong on a mission to capture stolen military hardware.

Director: Russell Solberg
Writer: Jacobsen Hart
Stars: Burt Reynolds, Matt Battaglia, Krista Allen
Genre: Action


00:00 Full movie with subtitles
00:56 Raven team activates DEFCON protocol to infiltrate enemy territory
05:21 Bill Gillie reveals the Soviet 666 decoder's $50M value to Senator Berg
13:23 Raven resigns from the team, declaring "I can't kill anymore"
35:10 Adib Hussein demands the decoder, threatening Senator Berg's operation
55:03 Raven confronts allies about civilian casualties: "You killed innocents for money!"
1:14:31 Final warehouse showdown erupts between Raven and government operatives
1:28:04 Kali betrays Martin, revealing her CIA infiltration of his civilian life
1:32:40 Raven destroys decoder, rejecting government and mercenary agendas


Does this film make the cut?  ⭐ Best of the Worst B-Movies ⭐
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdYUNFx3C0xMQLKXcmuCW5w5


@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Martin Grant has been hiding for years to escape his past as a ruthless mercenary in the elite force Raven Team. He's recently been engaged and are trying to forget the nightmares of murder and betrayal. Martin was convinced, that he could escape... But no one escapes from the Raven Teams ruthless leader Raven. At least not alive. Raven is back with a new team to hunt down and eliminate Grant...
metadata.Actors: Burt Reynolds, Matt Battaglia, Krista Allen, David Ackroyd
